inputs: Text prompts (e.g., 'a cinematic view of a futuristic city at night')
Image inputs (for start or end frames, style references, or mood boards)
Start and end frames for transitions
Scene descriptions to create narrative-based videos
outputs: Short animated videos up to 5 minutes
Smooth frame-to-frame transitions with cinematic effects
Seamless looping videos for continuous playback
Cinematic trailers with dynamic camera movements

technical_specifications.resolution: Supports up to 4K UHD (3840x2160) at 60 FPS
technical_specifications.style_transfer: Applies reference styles dynamically to align with user-provided visuals

capabilities: Dynamic zooms and panning for cinematic storytelling
Particle effects such as smoke, sparks, or magical glows
Physics-based animations (e.g., falling leaves or splashing water)
Customizable lighting setups to match day, night, or golden hour themes
AI-synced music generation based on scene mood
Depth of field control for professional-looking shots
Color grading options for post-production quality
enhancements: Support for generating videos with narrative overlays (e.g., captions or subtitles)
Customizable aspect ratios for various platforms (16:9, 9:16, 1:1, etc.)
Looping optimizations for background visuals in games or apps
Integration with external assets like sound effects or voiceovers
Support for style mixing (e.g., combining cyberpunk with retro aesthetics)

examples.input: Create a cinematic video of a spaceship entering hyperspace.
examples.output: A 20-second video featuring a detailed spaceship, glowing hyperspace tunnels, and dynamic lighting effects.

examples.input: Generate an animated loop of a waterfall in a tropical jungle.
examples.output: A seamless 15-second loop showing a realistic waterfall, mist effects, and sunlight filtering through dense foliage.

examples.input: Make a trailer for a sci-fi movie with a robot uprising.
examples.output: A 90-second video with intense music, dramatic transitions, and scenes showcasing robots battling humans in a neon-lit city.

examples.input: Produce a looping background of a cozy cabin during snowfall.
examples.output: A 30-second loop showing a warmly lit cabin with snowflakes gently falling and smoke rising from the chimney.

examples.input: Create a promotional video for a fantasy RPG game.
examples.output: A 60-second cinematic with scenes of mystical forests, a hero battling dragons, and text overlays introducing the storyline.

limitations.audio_support: Limited to background music generation; no voice synthesis yet
limitations.complex_scenes: High-detail multi-scene videos may require additional rendering time

feedback.description: Allows users to rate generated videos and provide detailed comments for improvements.
